files.description: Command-line Python automation script that discovers or generates an exemplar URL list (from an existing list, media catalog, or by extracting URLs from the pilot case study), checks reachability with timestamps, optionally triggers an archival snapshot policy, and writes results to runtime/outputs/qa/LINK_CHECK_REPORT.csv.
Optional exemplar URL seed list (single column 'url') used by the link-check script when present to define which URLs to validate.
Optional configuration file providing defaults for timeouts, user agent, input discovery paths, and archival snapshot policy for the link-check script.

missionDescription: Implement link-check automation for exemplar URLs referenced in case studies and/or a media catalog (reachability + timestamp + optional archival snapshot policy), saving results under runtime/outputs/qa/LINK_CHECK_REPORT.csv. If no exemplar list exists yet, generate a minimal exemplar URL list from the pilot case study as the first test input.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Missing direction explicitly called out: link-check automation. This is required to keep multimedia exemplars stable and auditable, and to prevent silent rot as the catalog scales.
